Medium: Each cover with letterpress lettering (and some also with photographic or photomontage illustrations) on front, and letterpress lettering on back (publisher's logo) and spine; letterpress texts include typographic designs; B (no. 2, 1923) includes 2 letterpress illustrations (sportwear design by Stepanova and poster design by Rodchenko); E ( no. 2, 1924) incorporates a design by Liubov' Popova on cover, 4 pages of letterpress illustrations of textile designs by Popova, Stepanova, and Rodchenko, and 1 letterpress photomontage of Popova by an unknown artist
CreditLine: Gift of The Judith Rothschild Foundation
Title: LEF. Zhurnal levogo fronta iskusstv, nos. 1-7
